title: i would like some help
body: im pretty sure my account was hacked

replies.body: If you believe an unauthorized user has accessed your account, fear not!  Rest easy knowing we have to tools to help you out!  Go over our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to help regain access.  If that doesn't help, just hit us up with an [account recovery ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416)  Our account team can help you out!
